meanings.sent1: The nonrotating wheel on the car stayed still.
meanings.sent2: The nonrotating fan sat quietly in the corner.
meanings.sent3: The nonrotating merry-go-round was quite a sight at the park.
meanings.sent4: The nonrotating planets in the solar system amazed the astronomers.
meanings.sent5: The nonrotating statue in the garden seemed frozen in time.

meanings.definition: Remaining stationary or fixed in place.
meanings.sent1: The nonrotating satellite orbited the Earth without moving.
meanings.sent2: The nonrotating chair in the room was always in the same spot.
meanings.sent3: The nonrotating clock on the wall played a prank on everyone by not ticking.
meanings.sent4: The nonrotating lighthouse guided ships safely to shore.
meanings.sent5: The nonrotating tree in the yard provided shade all day long.
